email.subject: PhD and Postdoc Positions at CISPA/University of Stuttgart

topics: AI to reason about and modify software (e.g., LLM agents for finding and fixing bugs)
static and dynamic program analysis (e.g., to infer specifications)
test input generation (e.g., to compare the behavior of old and new code via differential testing)

main_content.details: The positions will be at CISPA, are fully funded, and will be filled as soon as possible.

body.note: To contribute to SEWORLD, send your submission to mailto:[log in to unmask]

resources.info: provides more information on SEWORLD as well as links to a complete archive of messages posted to the list.
